short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension for taking science notes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension for taking science notes. Simple - Clean - Performance.
- Simple interface
- Take Notes and Search Quickly
- Supports data import and export
- Suitable for scientific notes that need simplicity but effectiveness
